entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 01:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: WNW 35 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 100 this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
